          <title>
            <string language="en">The rock cycle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Felsenschleife</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le cycle de roche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O ciclo da rocha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il ciclo della roccia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο κύκλος βράχου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El ciclo de la roca</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This flow chart illustrates the recycling processes that rocks undergo that lead to the formation of other kinds of rocks. This may be used for a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">igneous rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">melting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">metamorphic rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pressure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rock cycle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rock recycling</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sedimentary rocks</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solidification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">weathering</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Flußdiagramm veranschaulicht die 
aufbereitenprozesse, die Felsen durchmachen, die zu die Anordnung 
anderer Arten Felsen führen. Dieses kann für eine 
beschriftende Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet organigramme illustre les processus de 
réutilisation que les roches subissent qui mènent à la formation 
d'autres genres de roches. Ceci peut être utilisé pour un 
exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta carta de fluxo ilustra os processos 
recycling a que as rochas se submetem que conduzem à formação de 
outros tipos das rochas. Isto pode ser usado para um exercício 
etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo diagramma di flusso illustra i processi di
riciclaggio che le roccie subiscono che conducono alla formazione di 
altri generi di roccie. Ciò può essere usata per 
un'esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα ροής επεξηγεί τις διαδικασίες 
ανακύκλωσης σπου οι βράχοι υποβάλλονται ότι μόλυβδος στο 
σχηματισμό άλλων ειδών βράχων. Αυτό μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί για μια άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este organigrama ilustra los procesos de 
reciclaje que las rocas experimentan que conducen a la formación de 
otras clases de rocas. Esto se puede utilizar para un ejercicio 
de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
